tracks.text: Metro Goldwyn Mayer Trademark
8 stars form the Orion constellation. The stars transform into a circle and spin, forming an O. An Orion Pictures Release.
The sun dips behind clouds. Words appear. A Dick Clark, Larry Spiegel, Mel Bergman Production.
Poles stand above geometric shaped structures. A weather vane spins on one of the poles. Words appear. A Guy Hamilton Film.
The poles are on the roof of a large church that is under construction. Warm lights glow from inside.
Scenses of New York City at night.
Credits appear. Fred Ward, Joel Grey, Wilford Brimley
Red text. Remo Williams. The Adventure Begins.
J. A. Preston, Goerge Coe, Charles Cioffi as Grove, and Kate Mulgrew as Rayner Fleming. Co-Starring Patrick Kilpatrick, Michael Pataki. Casting by Amanda Mackey and Jane Jenkins, Janet Hirshenson.
Music composed by Craig Safan. Edited by Mark Melnick. Production designer Jackson de Govia. Director of Photograph Andrew Laszlo.

Based on The Destoryer series by Richard Sapir and Warren Murphy. Executive producers Dick Clark, Mel Bergman. Co-producer Judy Goldstein. Written by Christopher Wood. Produced by Larry Spiegel. Directed by Guy Hamilton.
At night, a small boat approaches the Brooklyn Bridge.
In a lot full of broken street signs and trash, a man sits in a dark police car.
He reaches to his portable radio, sitting amongst trash in the car.
The man picks up a paper cup from his dashboard. He's a middle aged white man with short, slicked back black hair and a mustache. He drinks from the cup and takes a bite of his sandwhich.
He chews his sandwich.
He puts his cup down next to New York Jets merchandise.
The man picks up a radio reciever, then notices figures running near a building.
A man in a jacket runs around a corner. The police officer puts the receiver back down.
2 more figures run around the corner. They chase after the man in the jacket.
The cop car slowly drives around the corner.
The man in the jacket runs toward a dilapidated warehouse. His pursuers gain on him.
In the darkness, the pursuers hold and punch the man in the jacket.
The cop car drives slowly into the warehouse.
The black man hits the cop over the head with a wooden board.
The cop punches the black man. He turns, and the brunette punches him in the face.
The white men take turns punching and kicking the cop. The cop punches the brunette in the nuts, and the blond man in the chin.
The brunette punches the cop back. The cop picks up a 2 by 4, and bashes the brunette in the nose. The cop and blond man trade punches.
The cop holds the blond man's hair and punches him in the face. The blond man falls to the ground.
The black man pulls out a switchblade and waves it around.
The cop dodges, and pushes the black man into a wall. The blond man grabs the cop from behind.
The cop flips the blond man over his shoulder onto the ground, twists the man's arm, and kicks him.
The cop turns around. The black man is crawling away, his jacket jangling.
The cop steps on the black man's hand, then hits him with an old refridgerator door.
The cop stumbles past the unconscious bodies.
The cop picks up his gun, checks it, and then sighs.
He puts his gun down on his dashboard, and picks up his cup. He drinks. His face is bloody.
A truck pulls into the warehouse. It rams the cop car, sending the cop's face into the windshield.
The cop looks behind him, face bloody. The truck pushes the cop car forward. The driver is the black man, now wearing glasses and a hat.
The truck pushes the cop car through debris, through the wall of the warehouse, and into the rivertowards the river.

The cop car turns on its headlights, and the 3 men stop struggling and turn. The man in the jacket is a black man, and the pursuers are younger, one brunette and one blond. The cop gets out of his car, holding up a gun. The white men push the black man aside and start to run off.
The cop, fully submerged, hits his fist against the windshield. He picks up a baton and hits the window, but it bounces back.
Flashlights flicker in darkness.
At a funeral
From a distance, the black man from the truck watches the funeral.
A man with short black hair lies in a hospital bed. He has bruises and shaving cream on his face.
He looks at himself in the mirror.
The black man carries a newspaper and gift bag.
The back of a bedpan reads Williams Manufacturing Company, Remo, Arkansas
Remo looks at his new name on the hospital chart, then throws it against his bed.
Wearing a suit, Remo walks out of the hospital. He passes an ambulance, where EMT's are wheeling in an old man.
Remo drives the ambulance around a corner. He smiles.
A gun points at him from the ambulance bay.
Remo walks by a window, overlooking a massive room with massive computers.
They exit an elevator on the fourth floor. They walk to a door labeled Harold W. Smith, Assistant research manager.

Harold Smith, a white man with a bushy mustache, watches news scroll by. He hears something, presses a button, and looks at security footage of Remo and MacCleary. He turns off the screen and spins around in his chair.
A red car pulls up to a residential street.
MacCleary hands Remo a key.
MacCleary hands Remo a gun.
Remo walks towards the front door of a townhouse, opens a side gate, and walks down stairs to a lower level.
He walks through the downstairs door, slowly closes it behind him, and pulls out a gun.
He sees a chinese man doing calligraphy. The calligrapher looks at Remo. Remo puts a finger to his mouth, points at the gun, and walks past.
Remo checks over his shoulder at the calligrapher.
The calligrapher watches Remo walk away.
Remo climbs the basement stairs and tries the doorknob.
The calligrapher stands.
The calligrapher reaches into his shirt.
The calligrapher dodges.
The calligrapher smiles. He looks at the gun, Remo's twitching fingers on the trigger, his tense kncukle, his twitching eyebrow.
The calligrapher dodges, gets close to Remo, grabs his gun, turns the gun over, pops the clip in the air, and removes the remaining bullets.
The calligrapher returns the clip and takes the gun. Remo tries to punch the calligrapher, who dodges.
Remo jumps at the calligrapher, who dodges. Remo slides down and off of a table. The calligrapher puts the gun on a counter, picks up a basket of fruit, and turns around.
Remo tries to punch the calligrapher, who dodges. Remo's fist goes through a cabinet.
The calligrapher stands, his arms at a right angle.
The calligrapher dodges kicks and punches, then strikes him with 1 finger. Remo flies into furniture.
In the car, MacCleary chuckles.
Remo tries to hit the calligrapher in the head with furniture.
Remo falls to the ground. He gets up, takes a running leap at the calligrapher, and slides into an upright piano.
Harold watches his computer.
From the IRS
Frank Melnick, Jane Edwards, and John "Skippy" Edwards, a child
Carrying bags, they walk down an alley
MacCleary holds up a duffle bag
Finger gun
Chun sits on the floor in an empty apartment.
Chun gestures to a small matt in front of him.
Remo's face falls.
He sits cross legged on the carpet.
Chun quickly reaches a finger out. Remo falls backwards, grasping at his heart.
Chun rises
Chun grabs Remo's outstretched hand, and he stops writhing in pain.
Chun touches Remo in the stomach, and Remo stumbles, grabbing his stomach.
Chun taps behind Remo's ear, and his body relaxes. Remo drops to the floor.
He lies on the ground outside
Chun stands on Remo's stomach. He jumps off and runs to the edge of the roof. Remo gets up.
Remo jumps onto the edge of the roof and looks down at the street.
Chun runs off, then stops and turns around.
Remo looks down, and gingerly takes a small step.
He takes larger steps
Frowning, Remo takes off after Chun.
They can be seen from the street, walking along the edges of the rooftops.
A man in a nice suit is photographed with boy scouts in front of the capital building.
The man gets into a limo with an aide.
At the pentagon, Army Major Fleming types on a keyboard.
HARP DBA Ref. George S. Grove
Access Denied
Fleming walks through a garage.
She walks into the office of Brigadier General S Watson.
Remo unpacks in a loft.
He climbs over the stairs, holds his feet in the air while holding the side of the stair well, then lands feet first on the ground.
The fridge is empty, except for 4 ornate bowls of rice and a large jar of something resembling leeches.
Chun, in pajamas, holds a square with 8 tendrils.
Chun looks at Remo without touching him. Remo collapses against the counter, in pain.
Chun presses his finger into the center of the board, creating a hole in the center.
At night, Remo uses the board alone in his loft.
Remo pretends to use the finger board as a frisbee, then places it on a nail on the wall.
Remo looks over the railing to see Chun watching TV
Remo walks by junk strewn around the living room. He walks up a wood plank, balanced against a bird bath stand.
He jumps from the stand to the middle of the plank, causing it to lie against a bath tub. We walks along the edge of the tub, while Chun makes TV behind him.
He jumps onto the edge of a propped up folding table.
He jumps to a drink dispenser several feet away.
He leaps on top of a magazine display rack and balances precariously.
He jumps on top of a standing 4 by 4, and balances on 1 leg
He jumps on top of a horizontal pipe, and walks across it, struggling to maintain balance.
He makes it to the other side. He smiles and looks towards Chun, who is walking away.
Remo leaps from the horizontal pipe to the top of a vertical one, and from there to a bamboo pole.
He steps down from the last pipe, back in his loft.
The lights go out
A mechanical soldier dummy pops between trees
Several soldiers in camo, hats, and backpacks shoot at the dummy.
Soldiers cross a river
The soldiers walk through the jungle
They swiftly behead another dummy
A soldier struggles with their gun
The solder tries to shoot a dummy. They fall backwards, their face covered in blood.
Another soldier jumps runs after him
Major Fleming sees the incident. She looks down at a scraped up metal tube with the text "Grove".
In a limo, an aide hands the phone to Grove.
Grove's limo drives by the capital building.
Chun sits in a ferris wheel car. Remo hangs from the bottom.
It's the Coney Island wonder wheel, with 2 concentric circles of cars. The center circle slides the cars around in different directions, including toward the outer edge.
He begins to climb up the car.
Remo watches a car from the inner circle swing towards Chun's car, and then swing back.
He climbs to the top of the car.
At the top of the Wonder Wheel, Remo can see a beach and pier.
He turns around, and another car swings towards him. He jumps off the car, and holds on to the grate behind Chun.
Remo climbs onto the outside of the wheel.
Reaching the bottom, Remo jumps off the metal frame.
He opens the door of Chun's car. Chun gets out without looking at Remo.
He gestures to pink panther dolls
He lands 4 in a precise square. The 5th and 6th stack in the center.
The carnival workers gapes. Remo and Chun carry a pink panther together down the board walk.
Remo walks into the apartment, carrying groceries.
Chun sits with his legs out and crossed, intently watching TV
Remo hides food on top of the cabinent.
Chun holds the relaxed pose while supporting his whole body on 4 fingers.
Chun points a gun at Remo's back. Remo dodges without looking.
Harold Smith watches a House Subcommittee meeting.
Major Rayner Fleming, Continental Airlines Flight 323, Arrive La Guardia Thursday 19 - 1100 hours
Stone, a man with a yellow tie, smiles widely.
Remo runs down a beach.
He runs by the pier he saw from the Wonder Wheel. From a distance, Chun watches him.
Remo makes a running leap into a sand dune, and disappears completely.
He re-emerges from the top.
He regains speed after a few steps.
He runs steadily and gracefully.
He doesn't leave footprints in the sand.
MacCleary joins Chun
Remo chases seagulls
At the apartment, Remo cooks
Chun tastes food in a pot
Chun holds a teapot
Remo picks up a pan and walks to Chun
Chun hands a cup to Remo
In the daytime, Major Fleming crosses a New York City street.
A silver car follows her
The driver watches Fleming enter a building. It's Grove's man, Stone.
Fleming enters through doors labeled Office of the Inspecting General
Colonel V Gaber is MacCleary
Her arms are full of papers. She gets into an elevator.
Remo slips in the elevator.
She stares straight ahead.
She looks down, suppresses a smile, then looks sharply at Remo.
Remo watches her leave the elevator, smiling
Stone looks at the building. He adjusts a pin on his lapel.
He taps a button on a black box
Fleming steps in front of Stone's car.
She raises her arm, dropping her papers. Remo walks out of the building.
Stone honks, and rolls forward.
Remo grabs Stone by the throat
A diamond on Stone's front tooth glistens
He draws an X, then throws Stone away
The colonel steps outside of the building, and Stone photographs him.
Grove polishes a rifle.
Remo
They are in the crown of the Statue of Liberty
The statue is covered in scaffolding.
3 men in workers helmets walk away from a man in a black leather jacket. It's Stone. The twin towers are across the bay in the distance. He looks up at the scaffolding.
Remo looks down at the scaffolding.
We circle around Remo, standing alone at the top of the scaffolding.
Boats leave wakes across the bay, on both sides of Manhattan.
An elevator rises.
Chun greets it
The workmen get out, passing Chun.
Chun gets in the elevator, and an operator closes the elevator door
Workmen sidle along the scaffolding.
Stone watches with 2 men.
Remo looks at the twin towers
The red hat workman kicks the platform Remo is standing on.
Remo walks across the long, narrow platform towards the workmen.
He falls, and catches himself on a crossbar
He swings hand over hand, making his way to a walkway.
Blue hat workman steps on Remo's fingers. He falls to another crossbar.
He looks down. The top of the statue's head is off to the left. He crawls along the crossbar.
The workmen make their way after him.
Remo climbs over an I bar, and runs along a walkway
Remo shuffles towards the edge. He encounters a pipe and board.
He picks up the pipe
Green hat workman picks up a hook on a rope and swings it.
Green keeps swinging and kicks Remo's walkway
Below, Red hits the scaffolding with a wrench.
Remo drops his pipe.
Green loosens a nut.
Remo loses his balance, and grabs a vertical pipe.
The pipe bends towards the bay. Remo holds on by one hand.
He flails, dangling above the ground.
From the ground the dangling pipe seems small, and the flailing figure tiny.
Remo gets the rest of his body to the pipe, and slowly slides down
He climbs back on the scaffolding.
Blue is a few feet away. Red and Green make their way down.
Remo grabs a rope, looks down, and jumps
He swings onto the statue's torch, which is missing its flame.
He hides behind the statue's thumb
They swing their hook ropes at the torch.
Remo's hand dodges Blue's hook. He slides backwards.
He slides down the statue's arm, stopping at her sleeve.
He falls sideways, and lands on a suspended rig.
The rig breaks. Bay. Bars. Statue. Falling.
A tied up brown bag lands at the statue's toes.
Stone leads the other 2 away. The workmen climb down. Remo dangles from beneath the rig.
The rig swings
Chun stands behind boys fishing
Chun looks up
Remo swings. He gets a foot on the statue's hair.
He crawls up onto her shoulder, then looks down at lawn.
He walks along the statue's neck.
He looks at the ground on the other side.
He looks up. A rope swings.
He slides down to the V of the statue's robe.
Hands up
He looks at the ground
He leaps and grabs the rope
Gripping the rope with his hands and feet, he slides
Landing by the ankles, he runs off
The workmen ride the elevator down
The elevator slips beneath a floor. Remo lands on the floor
He jumps on top of the elevator and pulls out a wire.
Remo opens a hatch. Red looks up, eyes wide
Remo pulls off his hat, and hits him in the face
Red tries to climb up, but Remo hits him with a plank. He collapses.
Green climbs up, and Remo closes the hatch on him.
Blue tries to stab Remo through the grating with a wrench shiv. His left hand tries to find a grip, but has to dodge the wrench.
Remo climbs down the grating while dodging
The workmen look down.
He's at the door.
Remo shoves Green's face into machinery, then punches Blue.
He wraps a rope around Blue's neck.
He pushes Blue
The rope goes taut.
Green grabs Remo from behind.
Remo dislocates Green's wrist, elbows him in the neck, and then closes the door on his chest. It's limp.
Blue dangles by his ankle and flails.
Stone walks down a boardwalk, far below the statue
Remo sidles along the outside of the scaffolding.
He walks along a horizontal pole. A workman looks up at him.
Stone stops and turns around.
Remo slides down a vertical pole, landing next to a tree.
Stone's men take out their guns
Irish henchman runs straight, italian henchman runs right
Remo rounds a corner and sprints.
The Irishman shoots. Chun turns around.
Remo is blocked by a wet concrete pour
He runs along the top of the concrete, leaving shallow footprints.
The irishman follows
He sinks to his neck.
The irishman looks confused, then fully sinks
Remo leaps a hedge
A workman gapes
Remo runs to a railing and looks over the bay.
Stone watches from a motorboat.
The italian rounds the corner.
Chun comes up behind him.
Remo looks over, but they've disappeared.
The Italian lies, his limbs and spine twisted in new directions. Chun walks away.
Remo watches the boat. Stone, a pale dot in the distance, watches back.
Chun lights candles sitting on a tiger skin
Remo climbs the stairs to his loft. Chun pauses for a second before continuing.
Remo pulls clothes out of a dresser, and looks over the side of the loft
Chun uses a brush to write on a scroll.
The pink panther sits by the window.
Chun carries a bag.
Remo looks back at the apartment, and closes the door.
A truck pulls up to a Grove Aerospace warehouse.
A security guard leaves a booth and opens a gate.
The security guard waves the truck through.
The guard closes the gate, returns to the booth, and grabs coffee. The fence has signs reading "Gate 6".
On the other side of the booth, the fence reads "Danger High Voltage"
MacCleary and Remo, wearing all black, sneak up to the fence.
MacCleary uses wire cutters on the fence.
He pulls back his left sleeve, revealing a wooden cylinder. He winks, Remo smiles.
In the booth, 1 guard reads a book, while another naps.
The fence has a large hole.
MacCleary and Remo run past storage
MacCleary goes right, towards the building. Remo goes left.
Remo passes a forklift and runs inside a warehouse
He walks slowly, looking around
He walks by a pile of dirt labeled Caution - Toxic
A doberman walks in
The doberman leaps and Remo ducks
2 more doberman run in
Remo leaps and grabs the underside of a walkway, about 5 feet up
The dogs try to leap and bite. He lifts up his legs and tries to climb.
They turn around and split up
One climbs stairs
The stairs lead to a door, and then continue to climb higher.
Remo turns to the other 2 dogs, which stop under retracted stairs. They leap and grab a handle by the mouth. It slowly drops down.
Remo stares, mouth open
The first dog has come down a different set of stairs
He stands on the walkway railing, and reaches to the next floor walkway.
The first doberman heads back up the stairs.
On the third level, Remo sees the doberman coming for him from both directions.
He closes a door on the pair on his right
The one on the left gets closer. Remo climbs over the railing to an exterior ladder.
The dog leaps and grabs his foot.
He shakes the dog off
He looks around inside, then climbs up toward the roof.
2 dogs look down at him from the roof.
A rat sniffs his shoe
He shimmies towards a window.
A rat crawls up his pants.
He grabs at his left thigh
The rat jumps out of his pant leg.
More rats scurry around on the floor, between broken glass.
He climbs up a exhaust vent.
He emerges on the roof
He grabs the vent hat and swings down
He runs across the roof
He slides through the blades of a disabled fan.
He crouches in the vent and comes up to a grate.
He jumps down
He climbs down some stairs towards a light
8 panels of light are angled together to form an octagon.
He shakes a hook on a nearby cable.
He ziplines down into the octagon.
He looks up to see hexagonal panels hanging from bars
He walks around the outside of the hectagon, looking at the machinery. There's a satellite dish, several appendages, and a cable hanging out of the device.
He stands in moonlight. He looks up at the roof window. 2 dobermans watch  him.
A box with several lenses turns towards him.
It shoots a laser, which bounces off of the dish, which hits the large device. Sparks fly.
Another laser strikes the device.
Remo runs. The device erupts in flame.
The device falls, surrounded by a column of fire.
A mushroom of fire lights up the night. The guards at gate 6 look up.
MacCleary looks at the light through the window. He carries a flashlight at a cabinet with reels of thin tapes.
The guards get in a ruck
Remo runs across a roof
He comes to a wire, lying across a gap between 2 buildings.
A doberman runs across the roof
Remo takes a step onto the rope
The dog stops and cocks his head. Remo is several steps across the gap.
Remo runs across a roof.
The doberman takes steps
The doberman is halfway across.
Remo slides down 1 story, leaps over a railing, drops 2 stories, and lands on the ground.
MacCleary runs and gets startled by another explosion.
Across the lawn, figures run with flashlights
MacCleary and Remo stop short.
A doberman comes running. Remo stops.
MacCleary holds out his left arm. Remo runs
The dog bites down on the arm.
Remo turns on the tractor lights. MacCleary reaches into his shirt
The dog pulls a detached arm to the ground.
The dog swings the arm around, tearing at it.
One armed, MacCleary runs towards the tractor and climbs up.
Remo rolls onto the ground and hops up.
The tractor strikes the fence
The doberman looks up, ears pointed back.
The security truck rounds a corner
Remo leaps over the burning, toppled fence.
We waves
MacCleary stops. Blood drips out of a hole in his back. He falls.
Remo runs to him.
He takes a reel of tape.
MacCleary's head drops.
Remo runs. MacCleary looks up and watches him go.
He looks up. Several flashlights point at his face.
MacCleary lies in a hospital bed with a tube in his nose.
Grove's aide looks at him.
The aide leaves.
MacCleary reaches over to a tray.
In the hallway, Grove walks up to the aide.
MacCleary holds a scalpel
He cuts the tubes behind him.
On Harold's screen, a diagram of the device
Mount Promise Proving Grounds United States Army Weapons Testing and Evaluation Command
At the base of a snow mountain
Soldiers salute Grove and an General Watson
Fleming looks at a clipboard.
Photos that Stone took
A truck enters Mount Promise through a checkpoint.
Remo rolls away from the truck. He wears BDUs with the name Williams. The collar is popped, his pants are rolled up, and he has no insignia.
He locks eyes with Fleming.
Grove sees them talking. Remo slouches.
They smile
Remo climbs in.
The 3 walk through a lab.
They're locked in a room.
Through a window, Stone smiles and claps.
Remo walks to the window.
Wilson joins Stone in the observation room.
The windows say Pressurized.
Stone rubs something on his nostrils.
Wilson presses buttons. Nearby, a chart says Military Kennel Status Control.
Gas streams into the room. Fleming bangs on the door.
Wilson walks away.
Fleming grabs her chest and leans against a wall. Remo runs and kicks the window.
Remo falls to the floor. Stone smiles.
Fleming collapses.
Stone turns to Remo, who tries to hold himself up
Stone laughs. Remo collapses.
Remo crawls to Fleming.
Stone walks into the pressure room, wearing a gas mask.
Stone kicks Remo.
Stone holds Remo in a choke hold.
Remo elbows Stone in the nuts, gets behind him, and removes his mask.
He presses Stone's tooth diamond against the glass.
Stone puts the mask back on. Remo punches through the mask's visor. Stone falls back, bloody.
Remo backs up, then runs and leaps through the X'd window.
A man in a labcoat walks into the observation room.
In the woods
He holds her steady, and she looks up at him.
They make their way down a ravine.
Watson looks at Grove
Remo grabs berries from a bush
He puts a finger to his lips, then walks towards a tree.
He disappears behind a tree, then goes flying.
Chun emerges from behind the tree. Fleming stares.
She raises an eyebrow
Fleming looks between them. Chun takes off his glasses.
They walk off. Fleming looks around, then follows them,.
2 mechanics work on a Gill Creek Logging truck near a sign saying Road Closed, United States Army Military Reservation, Danger, Keep Out
Remo, Fleming, and Chun climb into the truck.
Remo drives the truck down the dirt road.
A cable pulls on a log.
The log crosses the road
Chun goes for his door. Remo grabs Fleming and jumps. The pair land on the hill, as the truck barrels away
The truck hits a log and breaks into hundreds of pieces. The truck bed spins down the hill. Tanks spray gas. Dust and dirt settles on the rubble.
The road is empty
They look down at the rubble.
Remo runs down the hill.
Fleming picks her way through the grass
Remo looks at the truck frame, on his side. The nearby grass is on fire.
He pulls aside the passenger door. Its window is puckered.
Chun looks up
He smiles and runs off. Chun smiles.
Chun grabs Fleming's wrist, and she falls back. He tosses the door handle away.
Remo runs through the forest.
An observation tower
Grove and Watson listen from a jeep
Remo runs from the explosions
He leaps off a cliff and lands about 30 feet below, in pine needles.
He's on a log that starts moving.
The log gets pulled up vertically. He holds on.
A log is carried across wires, high above the treetops
The log can be seen from Grove's jeep, far away.
The jeep driver picks up a rifle.
Grove grabs the rifle and butts the driver.
Remo eyes the jeep and shimmies around the log.
Grove fires into the trees between him and Remo. Branches fall.
Remo winces as the rounds start hitting the log.
A branch breaks and Remo slips. From the jeep, Remo can be seen dangling from the bottom of the log.
The log disappears behind a hill.
Remo climbs to the top of the log, where it's suspended by a cable.
The jeep leaves a cloud of dust
Grove aims at Remo, on top of the log.
Remo tries to pry apart the attachment cable. He looks down at the jeep, then at a pile of logs above the road
Remo dangles alone from the cable
The loosed logs approach the road.
They hit the jeep, forcing it over a cliff.
It lands nose down in a cloud of smoke
Remo steps down onto a hill.
Fleming and Chun wait by a boat on a dock.
Remo runs to the rubble
He walks past
A gun points at him.
Grove walks towards him.
Remo dodges.
Remo walks closer, while dodging.
Remo disarms Grove.
He throws the gun and bullets away
He throws Grove over the jeep
He picks up a branch and rubs it with his thumb.
It ignites, and he throws it into a groove. Fire spreads.
Fleming and Chun see the explosion from across the lake.
Smith puts a pipe in his mouth.
Remo runs to the dock.
Chun walks along the lakeshore.
15 soldiers descend the hill behind him.
Chun turns around.
20 more soldiers block the dock.
Chun starts toward the lake.
Remo gapes.
The soldiers gape, lowering their guns.
Fleming gapes.
Chun runs across the lake.
Chun hops onto the dock, then into the boat.
Remo looks back at Fleming as he drives away. Chun stands on the bow.
Cast...
